]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event

* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const sys_Id = api.state.sysId;
    debugger;
    api.data.update_appointment_record_as_closed.execute({
      table: 'x_1287841_medimeet_appointment',
      sysId: sys_Id
     });

}
